data.text:
@kidneycareuk @PKDCharity @KidneyWales @Kidney_Research @UKKidney @NKF_UK I’m wondering how those who require the #monoclonalantibody are supposed to access this Rx if they 
don’t have ‘safe’ transport options ie. family members to take them. Also wonder what Rx options are if #patients are not in U.K. eg on holiday, work etc. #transplantrecipient
